forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain by the afternoon hours. High 1C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning changing to rain late. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 38F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 5C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 31F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
